blogs.author: Gary Gastelu
blogs.title: Federal safety agency talking Tesla about strange steering wheel
blogs.body: NHTSA said it is reaching out to Tesla to determine if the automaker's new rectangular steering wheel meets federal safety standards.

blogs.author: pooneh
blogs.title: Elon Musk accuses Discord of 'going corporate' after it bans Reddit group that is boosting Gamestop stock
blogs.body: Elon Musk has accused Discord of 'going corporate' after it banned a Reddit group which is boosting Gamestop, American Airlines and other shorted stocks to the fury of billionaire hedge fund managers.
